topic.title: Integrating Web Author with a File Storage Service

keywords.indexterm: Supported file storage services and CMS

body.p:
By default, the comes bundled with some plugins that allows you to integrate with the following file storage services:
Git hosted on GitHub
Git hosted on GitLab
Git hosted on Bitbucket
WebDAV
SharePoint Online
Perforce Helix
Other file storage services through a generic CMIS connector (for example, Alfresco, SharePoint On-Premise, or FileNet)
IBM Content Navigator (not bundled and requires manual installation)

is also integrated by many of the industry-leading content management service providers. CMS partners providing integrations for include Astoria, Componize, DitaExchange, DITAworks, KGU, RSI, Vasont, and IBM FileNet.

link.linktext: Oxygen XML Web Author Home Page
